snippet.title: Battle Room Beta new feature "Fog Feed"
snippet.description: We are implementing the first major update of Battle Room Beta. You may have seen the colorful fog covering our maps. This fog actually serves as an indicator. This system, which we call Fog Feed, is responsible for announcing all in-game news with color changes, texts and effects. Its biggest feature is to announce the achievements (Double Kill, etc.) achieved by the players during the match in a spectacular way so that everyone can see it. Of course, in the future, and most likely in the full version, it will turn into a feature where you can express your personality with completely customize effects, colors and text.

localized.title: Battle Room Beta new feature "Fog Feed"

Its biggest feature is to announce the achievements (Double Kill, etc.) achieved by the players during the match in a spectacular way so that everyone can see it. Of course, in the future, and most likely in the full version, it will turn into a feature where you can express your personality with completely customize effects, colors and text.
